process

void process(Asset asset,
             Reader reader,
             Writer writer,
             Context context)

Perform the processing of the given Asset by reading its content from the given Reader and writing the processed content to the Writer.

Parameters:
asset - The asset being processed.
reader - The reader containig the content to process.
writer - The destination writer.
